textContent:
Huge constantly moving transports with treasure inside are roaming around the plains. They are filled with enemies in tight rooms, and if you clear them all you gain access to the control room for loot. 
Transports are WMOs, but if I attach a vehicle in the middle of the transport and passengers that act as legs/wheels, they can be animated (or doodads, look up how transports have animations)
title: Transport fight
textContentHtml:
Huge constantly moving transports with treasure inside are roaming around the plains. They are filled with enemies in tight rooms, and if you clear them all you gain access to the control room for loot. 

Transports are WMOs, but if I attach a vehicle in the middle of the transport and passengers that act as legs/wheels, they can be animated (or doodads, look up how transports have animations)
